src/lib/components/Colorbar.react.js.description:
Colorbar Component

A component creating a colorbar with the d3 library.
It accepts a set of stops defining the color gradient, 
a title, and optional labels for specific positions.
It automatically adjusts to the width of its container
and uses a ResizeObserver to handle responsive resizing.
It also supports formatting of labels using d3-format
or native JavaScript formatting.

Dependencies:
- d3: For creating the SVG elements and handling the color gradient.
- Mantine: For styling and layout.

stops.description: The stops to infer the colorbar from.

labels.description:
Labels for specific positions on the colorbar.
Keys are positions (0 to 1) and values are label texts.

format.description:
Optional format function for labels.
If provided, it will be used to format the label text.

src/lib/components/DashMaplibre.react.js.description:
DashMaplibre is a React component for displaying interactive maps using MapLibre GL JS.
It supports custom basemaps, layers, sources, and interactive features like hover popups and click events.
It is designed to be used within a Dash application, allowing for dynamic updates and interactivity.

Dependencies:
- maplibre-gl: For rendering maps and handling layers/sources.
- Colorbar: A custom component for displaying colorbars alongside the map.
- Mantine for styling and layout.

id.description: The unique ID of this component.

basemap.description:
The basemap style, either as a URL string to a MapLibre style JSON,
or as a style JSON object.

center.description: The map center as a [longitude, latitude] array.

zoom.description: The zoom level of the map.

max_bounds.description: The maximum bounds of the map as [[west, south], [east, north]].

bearing.description: The bearing (rotation) of the map in degrees.

pitch.description: The pitch (tilt) of the map in degrees.

sources.description: The sources definition for MapLibre, as an object mapping source IDs to source definitions.

layers.description: The array of MapLibre layer definitions to display on the map.

style.description: Additional CSS styles to apply to the map container.

colorbar_map.description:
Configuration for the colorbar legend for the map.
Can be a single colorbar config object, or a dictionary where keys are zoom levels
(as numbers or strings) and values are colorbar config objects. The colorbar for the
highest zoom key less than or equal to the current zoom will be shown.

colorbar_risk.description: Configuration for the colorbar legend for risk visualization.

setProps.description: Dash callback setter for prop updates (provided by Dash).

version.description: Optional version string to display in the lower right corner of the legend.
